name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 65: The Golf
overview: Simple 1500 Series vol. 65 - The Golf is a third person perspective golf game That features 4 different character for the player to choose. There is only one tournament and also a ranking. The player can practice all the holes in the free mode and then compete againts the computer characters in the tournament. The game features up to 4 human players using the multitap mode,
